nodes.text: Fahren Jaj, also known as the Laughing Lord, was a female Sith who was part of the Infernal Council, a group of Sith enslaved by the Rakata warlord Soa and imprisoned with him in the Eternity Vault on the planet Belsavis.

Fahren Jaj, the Laughing Lord, first appeared as part of the Operation "The Eternity Vault" in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a 2011 massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game released by BioWare and LucasArts.
